description: Improving Human Development Literacy and Strengthening Capacities for Implementation of MDGs in Central, Eastern Europe and the CIS

subproject.description:
1/ The project aims at improving HD literacy and strengthening capacities for implementation of MDGs in CEE & CIS.
2/ Improved understanding of stakeholders (students, civil society, policy makers) of HD and MDGs.  
3/ Supports the activities related to HD in the region - CoP, education activities and preparation of HD papers. 
4/ Dissemination of HD & MDG related knowl. products.
5/ Improvement of understanding the HD consequences of the financial crisis
6/ Increase of capacities to address Roma exclusion in a complex manner
subproject.title: Improving Human Development
